info.description: a service for moderating, analyzing, and managing chats, as well as news and other themed channels in the Telegram messenger

keyboardDialog.title: Add button
keyboardDialog.description: Select the type of button, and fill out the form to add a button, the appropriate type

step2.emptyChatsArrayTextError: You have to choose at least 1 chat

final.message: Thank you for use our service
final.description: Your request has been generated and will be processed on time

clearSystemMessage.title: Clear system messages
clearSystemMessage.description: Bot will be delete system messages from the chat
clearSystemMessage.option: Clear all types of the system messages

systemMessages.new_chat_photo: Admin changed photo in the chat
systemMessages.new_chat_title: Admin changed title in the chat

botValidation.switchDescription: Select this option if you want bots added by ordinary users to be blocked and not be able to collect information from your chat room

greetingMessage.isEnabledDescription: If you enable this setting, the bot will welcome new users who enter the chat room
greetingMessage.deletePreviousDescription: If you enable this setting, then as soon as a new user enters the chat room, the bot will automatically delete the previous message
greetingMessage.greetingMessageDescription: You can set your own custom welcome message for new members
greetingMessage.clearTimeTitle: Time of automatic deletion of the welcome message
greetingMessage.clearTimeDescription: By selecting this field - the bot will delete welcome messages after the selected time

stickerCleaner.removeStickerDescription: If the setting is enabled, the bot will delete all messages with stickers from the chat
stickerCleaner.removeGifDescription: If the setting is enabled, the bot will delete all messages with GIFs from chat
stickerCleaner.removeEmojiDescription: If the setting is enabled, the bot will delete all messages with custom Emoji from chat

deleteMessagesByChannel.title: Clear messages sent on behalf of a channel
deleteMessagesByChannel.description: The bot will delete messages sent by users on behalf of channels
deleteMessagesByChannel.messageAfterDeleteDescription: The bot will send a message after delete the user's message
